name: gateway
description: This api will communicate with anti-fraud services.

scripts.build: tsc && npx prisma generate && npx prisma run deploy
scripts.test:integrate: dotenv -e .env.test prisma migrate dev && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules dotenv -e .env.test jest -- -i --testPathPattern=tests/Integration
scripts.test: dotenv -e .env.test prisma migrate dev && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules dotenv -e .env.test jest -- -i
scripts.start: npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma db seed && nodemon src/server.ts
